.. Docpx documentation master file, created by
   sphinx-quickstart on Wed Jan  9 20:32:51 2013.
   You can adapt this file completely to your liking, but it should at least
   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to Docpx's documentation!
=================================

Docpx is a tool for creating beautiful documentation directly from your code!

Currently docpx has it's internals documented using itself.

Documentation on how to use it is in the works!

API
===

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1

   docpx/compiler
   docpx/data
   docpx/doc
   docpx/docblock
   docpx/logger
   docpx/token
   docpx/tokens
   docpx/writer
   docpx/utils

Configuration
=============

.. toctree::
    :maxdepth: 1

    docpx/const
